name: Combat.io
description:
Combat.io is an "online" fighting game, where you compete in an endless battle arena, fighting other players in hopes of besting your own high-score.

The more knock-outs you get, the better weapon you get. You can collect coins to unlock starter weapons, customize your character, get boosters to assist your game, and beat your own high score in this competitive game.

Credit to Eyedromeda: https://eyedromeda.itch.io/
